job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation.
job_details.full_text:
Backend (Cloud) Software Engineer

Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on backend software engineering, cloud-native development, and distributed systems within a Kubernetes environment. While it mentions catering to LLM applications, it does not detail specific generative AI tasks like fine-tuning, RAG, or advanced prompt engineering. The core responsibilities align more with traditional backend development and MLOps infrastructure rather than the direct development or adaptation of generative models themselves. Therefore, it doesn't fit the 'GenAI Engineer' or 'ML Engineer' profiles.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'developing high-performance, scalable software solutions', 'designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform', 'implement robust backend systems', and 'seamless integration with backend systems', which are core software development activities.
The role involves building and integrating systems, a key aspect of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform

job_tasks.justification: Implementing backend systems using frameworks is a direct software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications' indicates an understanding of the application domain the platform serves, aligning with business understanding.
job_tasks.phrase: caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments' and 'distributed systems' points towards infrastructure and deployment management, which falls under operations engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems

job_tasks.justification: Working with 'streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack' involves the operational aspects of deploying and securing cloud services.
job_tasks.phrase: streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack

job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with DevOps and front-end teams implies understanding different facets of the development lifecycle and integration needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams

job_tasks.justification: Driving test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation are crucial for maintaining and operating software in production.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams
designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform
